appDisplayName: gPodder - Media aggregator and podcast client
description:
gPodder is a simple, open source podcast client.

gPodder is a simple, open source podcast client.
This release only updates dependencies in the Windows and Mac builds.Linux, macOS and Windows are supported.Thanks to @auouymous for contributing to this release!Changes since 3.11.3:Bug fixes
- #1348 fix scaling issue on retina displays by updating all dependencies (Mac)
- newer urllib3 to fix an unlikely security vulnerability (Windows and Mac)
Known Bugs
- #1348 blurry text on retina displays (Mac)
CI references
- macOS CircleCI build 999
- Windows Appveyor build 1.0.1089
